price: El Mensajero de Dios [Sálih] los previno: "No maten a la camella de Dios [enviada como milagro] y déjenla abrevar libremente".
arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faqāla lahum rasūlu al-lahi nāqata al-lahi wasuq'yāhā
